rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0001
rows.name:
Maybe if we wander around the capital,
we can get a handle on the problems
and concerns of the people.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0003
rows.name:
Iira has much to celebrate.
Technology, wealth, and peace...

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0004
rows.name:
But I'm sure that the people here
are like any other, in having many
problems, small and large.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah... The realities of life are more
or less the same wherever you go.
I wonder how helpful we can really be...

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0006
rows.name:
Shin.. If people are in need, then we
should at least try to help them.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0007
rows.name:
We still have time before Metsu gets
here. We should make good use of it.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0009
rows.name:
Perhaps by aiding the community, we
will find allies in unexpected places.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0010
rows.name:
There is surely merit in trying,
is there not?
